directions: Place chickpeas in a saucepan over medium heat. Add water and taco seasoning. Cook and stir until thoroughly heated, 5 to 7 minutes. Remove from heat. Mash mixture to crush chickpeas.
Divide chickpea filling evenly among taco shells.
ingredients: 2 (15 ounce) cans chickpeas, drained and rinsed
1 (1 ounce) package taco seasoning mix (such as Taco Bell®)
title: Vegetarian Chickpea Tacos
